My Projects

Driekvandermeulen.nl

During my school time, I was tasked to create ceratin projects. During my 'Response To Innovations' lessons, I was tasked to make a website about innovations that benefit society. During my 'SIM' lessons, I was tasked to do short 14 hour projects in html/css. I'm currently doing a project with Boston Scientific at the media INN.
